00010 #ifndef BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_DETAIL_RELATIONAL_OP_CRTP_ER_2010_HPP
00011 #define BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_DETAIL_RELATIONAL_OP_CRTP_ER_2010_HPP
00012 #include <boost/utility/enable_if.hpp>
00013 #include <boost/type_traits/is_base_of.hpp> 
00014 
00015 namespace boost{
00016 namespace assign{
00017 namespace v2{
00018 namespace relational_op_aux{
00019 
00020 // A solution with 3 overloads was proposed here.
00021 // http://groups.google.com/group/comp.lang.c++.moderated/browse_thread/thread/389d8fe278ef0b13#
00022 // 2 overloads seem to suffice, however, as implemented below.
00023 
00024         struct base{};
00025 
00026         // D must implement:
00027     //  template<typename T> bool equal_to(const T&)const;
00028     //  template<typename T> bool less_than(const T&)const;
00029         template<typename D>
00030         struct crtp{// : base{
00031     
00032          D const& derived()const{ return static_cast<D const&>(*this); }
00033          
00034     };
00035 
00036         template<typename T>
00037     struct is_relational : boost::is_base_of<crtp<T>,T>{};
00038 
00039         template< typename A ,typename B>
00040     typename boost::disable_if<
00041                 relational_op_aux::is_relational<A>,
00042 //      boost::is_base_of<base,A>,
00043         bool
00044     >::type
00045     operator==( A const& a, crtp< B > const& b) 
00046         { 
00047                 return b.derived().equal_to( a );
00048         }
00049 
00050         template< typename A ,typename B>
00051         bool operator==( crtp< A > const& a, B const& b )
00052         { 
00053                 return b == a; 
00054         }       
00055 
00056         template< typename A ,typename B>
00057     typename boost::disable_if<
00058 //      boost::is_base_of<base,A>,
00059                 relational_op_aux::is_relational<A>,
00060         bool
00061     >::type
00062     operator<( A const& a, crtp< B > const& b) 
00063         { 
00064                 return ! ( (a == b) || (b < a) );
00065         }
00066 
00067         template< typename A ,typename B>
00068         bool operator<( crtp< A > const& a, B const& b )
00069         { 
00070                 return a.derived().less_than( b ); 
00071         }       
00072 
00073         // Deduced
00074 
00075 #define MACRO(symb,expr)\
00076         template< typename A ,typename B> \
00077     typename boost::disable_if< \
00078         boost::is_base_of<base,A>, \
00079         bool \
00080     >::type \
00081     operator symb ( A const& a, crtp< B > const& b) \
00082         { \
00083                 return expr; \
00084         } \
00085         \
00086         template< typename A ,typename B> \
00087         bool operator symb ( crtp< A > const& a, B const& b ) \
00088         { \
00089                 return expr; \
00090         } \
00091 
00092 
00093         MACRO( !=,  !(a == b)  )
00094         MACRO( <=,  (a < b) || (a == b)  )
00095         MACRO( >,   !(a <= b) )
00096         MACRO( >=,  (a > b) || (a == b) )
00097 
00098 #undef MACRO
00099     
00100 }// relational_op_aux
00101 }// v2
00102 }// assign
00103 }// boost
00104 
00105 #endif
